description: Abraham Zapruder's home-camera footage of the assassination of John F. Kennedy is treated to digital re-mastering. We also get to see the images hidden "between the sprocket holes, " making for a wider view of this much-analyzed e...
name: Image of an Assassination: A New Look at the Zapruder Film

original_info.id: Image of an Assassination: A New Look at the Zapruder Film_1998
original_info.name: Image of an Assassination: A New Look at the Zapruder Film

review.name: 26 seconds captured on a home camera shocks the world
review.reviewBody: Now finally the famous Zapruder film is available to own to the public. The original film was taken and digitally restored. It now shows a clear view of every movement of Kennedy and Conally. This film proves that there had to be a conspiracy to the killing of the president. I recommend this to film, its definitely to own!!
